name: Sky Jump (itch) (GalaxyCrafted)
description:
Tap to jump on moving platforms and travel the sky! Don’t fall, it hurts! Seriously,
Sky Jump is a gorgeous, addictive game that will keep you entertained for
hours.  

• Addictive one-touch gameplay
• Daily reward system for better retention
• 30 built-in unlock-able characters with cute blocky style
• Optimized for mobile
